text: @SenSchumer The CARES Act aids American workers suffering during this pandemic, not subsidize those who have broken our immigration laws. Over 33 million workers filed 4 unemployment since coronavirus hit. U want stimulus for payments to illegal aliens who don't pay taxes but are paid cash.
